wikipedia_page.main: Gerry Francis (born 6 December 1933) is a former professional footballer who played as a right winger for Leeds United, York City and Tonbridge Angels. He was the first black footballer to play for Leeds.

response: * Gerald Gerry Francis (born 1951), English former footballer and manager
* Gerald Gerry Francis (footballer, born 1933), South African-born footballer, first black footballer to play for Leeds United
